ValueSet-VaccineManufacturer.title: VaccineManufacturer Schema
ValueSet-VaccineManufacturer.description: JSON Schema for VaccineManufacturer ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-VaccineManufacturer.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the VaccineManufacturer ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/icvp/ValueSet-VaccineManufacturer.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
